title: Love Robot: Dripping Sexual Intelligence
overview: The body of a loved one is revived as a robot...  "I want you to comfort me during the loneliness of the nights when you are not around  Please make me cum forever!"  This is a heartwarming erotic drama about a protagonist who lost her beloved lover in an accident, and as she interacts with a robot that looks just like her lover, she gradually connects with him and overcomes her disappointment
